__e: Now, let me tell you about this lady... ( jazz playing softly ) ( Burkhalter laughing )
Me and Gretchen are to visit our father. He is also in the royal court.
Then you'll be happy. Then Gretchen and I can be happy.
"His secretary, Gretchen." Now, there's three words I never thought I'd hear you say.
You got it. Truth is, Gretchen, I know you better than you know yourself.
Gretchen, I swear, if you want to have a job tomorrow, you better tell me where Harvey is.
